argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-cos | |- cos = ( x e. CC |-> ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. x ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ax-icn | |- _i e. CC |
| 3 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ x e. CC ) -> ( _i x. x ) e. CC ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_mpan | |- ( x e. CC -> ( _i x. x ) e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( ( _i x. x ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( x e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_negicn | |- -u _i e. CC |
| 8 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( -u _i e. CC /\ x e. CC ) -> ( -u _i x. x ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpan | |- ( x e. CC -> ( -u _i x. x ) e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_efcl | |- ( ( -u _i x. x ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. x ) ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( x e. CC -> ( exp ` ( -u _i x. x ) ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_addcld | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. x ) ) ) e. CC ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_halfcld | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. x ) ) + ( exp ` ( -u _i x. x ) ) ) / 2 ) e. CC ) |
| 14 | 1, 13 | #P_fmpti | |- cos : CC --> CC |
